name: High Five Romance Race
description:
Play with your friend/lover/frenemy/parent/sibling/anybody, or play it alone!

Get as many coins as possible, but don't meet with an accident!

Originally the idea was to create a game you would control with high-fives (or holding hands); we used Makey Makey to make this possible at an exhibition in 2018.

Controls Singleplayer-Mode: Space Key = Everything

Controls Multiplayer-Mode: Left Ctrl + Right Ctrl = Everything

ESC = Return to start screen, exit the game

With music by Johannes-Paul Hanisch.
